modelCorrections.afterModification:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1.2">
- Thought: According to WCAG 2.1, the maximum-scale value should be at least 2.0 to allow users to zoom in on the content. I need to update the maximum-scale value to comply with this guideline.
- Corrected HTML: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=2.0">
